original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto sahāyakassa gharaṁ gantvā tassa pajāpatiyā saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappesi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanandaḥ sakya putto sahāyakassa gharam gantvā tassa pajāpatiyā saddhim ekaḥ ekāya rahaḥ nisajjam kappesi

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyo upanando mayhaṁ pajāpatiyā saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappessatī”ti.

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tassa purisassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto mātugāmena saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappessatī”ti …pe…
